Class Player

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.desitka.server.gameLogic.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyJoiningRequests, JoiningResults
public class Player extends Object implements JoiningResults, MyJoiningRequests
This class represents a player in the server.
